net.hudup.core.data.ctx

Class CTSManagerRemoteWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgRemoteWrapper
      • net.hudup.core.data.ctx.CTSManagerRemoteWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, Alg, AlgRemote, AlgRemoteTask, SetupAlgListener, AutoCloseable, CTSManager, CTSManagerRemote, CTSManagerRemoteTask, Exportable, Inspectable

    @BaseClass
public class CTSManagerRemoteWrapper
extends AlgRemoteWrapper
implements CTSManager, CTSManagerRemote
    This class is wrapper of remote context template manager.
    Version:
    12.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • profileOf

        public Profile profileOf(int ctxTemplateId,
                         ContextValue ctxValue)
        Description copied from interface: CTSManager
        Getting Profile of each template with regard to its value ContextValue. Every template owns a profile table and each value ContextValue of template corresponds to a row in this table. Moreover such value is id of such row.
        Specified by:
        profileOf in interface CTSManager
        Parameters:
        ctxTemplateId - specified template identification (ID).
        ctxValue - specified context value.
        Returns:
        profile of each template with regard to its value.

      • createCTSProfiles

        public CTSMultiProfiles createCTSProfiles()
        Description copied from interface: CTSManager
        Every template owns a profile table and each value ContextValue of template corresponds to a row in this table. Each row in such template profile table is represented by Profile class. This method retrieves all profiles of all templates represented by CTSMultiProfiles class.
        Specified by:
        createCTSProfiles in interface CTSManager
        Returns:
        all profiles of all templates, represented by CTSMultiProfiles class.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: AutoCloseable
        The main method of this interface, which is responsible for releasing resources occupied by auto-closable object. The finalize() method of auto-closable class should call AutoCloseable.close() method so that AutoCloseable.close() method is called automatically before the Java garbage collector destroys auto-closable object.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.
